short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily copy your crypto wallet addresses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Addy is a crypto lovers best friend! Easily have access to copy any of your wallet addresses without having to jump around Metamask, Phantom, Sparrow, etc. Store any address string from wallets across all chains and have access to them in a single tap. No wallet connection is required whatsoever, so Addy is 100% safe to use. A FREE, useful tool from glitch:).
